pages.text: A lot of mechanisms require the use of dropped $(thing)items$() in the world, which can easily be picked up by people inspecting the mechanism on accident.$(br)The $(item)Item Grounder$() causes items in the area to only be picked up by anyone if they're sneaking. Its area of effect ranges from 0 to 8 blocks around it and is determined, relatively, by the strength of the $(thing)redstone signal$() applied.
